text:
1、肥胖(体重指数 30.8 kg/m²)
腰围增大
建议控制膳食总热量，选用低脂、高膳食纤维食品，坚持
有氧运动，减轻体重。
2、心电轴右偏 建议结合临床，专科年度随访复查。
3、脂肪肝声像图（轻度）
动脉粥样硬化指数增高:5.13(参考区间:≤4)
血清总胆固醇测定增高:7.05mmol/L(参考区
间:≤5.18)
血清甘油三酯测定增高:3.37mmol/L(参考区
trans:
1. Obesity (Body Mass Index 30.8 kg/m²)
Increased waist circumference
Recommendations: Control total dietary calorie intake, choose low-fat, high-fiber foods, and maintain
regular aerobic exercise to reduce weight.
2. Right Axis Deviation on Electrocardiogram Recommendation: Combine with clinical evaluation and schedule annual specialist follow-ups for reassessment.
3. Mild Fatty Liver on Ultrasound
Increased Arteriosclerosis Index: 5.13 (Reference Range: ≤4)
Elevated Serum Total Cholesterol: 7.05 mmol/L (Reference
Range: ≤5.18)
Elevated Serum Triglycerides: 3.37 mmol/L (Reference Range
